title: Understanding Ionic Radii
text: Ionic radii are influenced by the number of electrons and the effective nuclear charge. Consider how gaining or losing electrons affects the size of an ion.

title: Compare Ionic Sizes
text: Cations (positive ions) are generally smaller than their neutral atoms, while anions (negative ions) are larger. Think about how this applies to the ions in the list.

title: Consider the Charge
text: The greater the positive charge, the smaller the ion. Conversely, the greater the negative charge, the larger the ion. Use this to compare the ions.
